analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/5/0xc71a7ecd96fef6e34a5c296bee9533f1deb0e3c1.sol#173-176) is never initialized. It is used in:

CaelumToken.manualUpgradePartialTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xc71a7ecd96fef6e34a5c296bee9533f1deb0e3c1.sol#620-651) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(ERC20(_token).balanceOf(msg.sender) == newBalance,Balance error.)
	- ERC20(allowedSwapAddress01).balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 && ERC20(allowedSwapAddress02).balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0
	- ERC20(allowedSwapAddress01).balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 && ERC20(allowedSwapAddress02).balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0
